CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: After purification , gel - permeation chromatography ( GPC ) analysis against PS standard exhibits a number - averaged molecular mass ( M n ) of 83^000 g / mol with a polydispersity ( PDI ) of 2.51.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PS (Polystyrene standard) |
| gel-permeation chromatography (GPC) product (if specific material is not mentioned, it can be assumed to be the material being analyzed) |
| purified material (implied, but not explicitly stated) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PS (Polystyrene standard) |
| purified material (if specific material is not mentioned, it can be assumed to be the material being analyzed) |

Paragraph: After purification , gel - permeation chromatography ( GPC ) analysis against PS standard exhibits a number - averaged molecular mass ( M n ) of 83^000 g / mol with a polydispersity ( PDI ) of 2.51.

| -------------- |

Note: I assumed that "molar mass" and "g / mol" are the same as "molecular mass" and kept it as is in the table. If "molar mass" is intended to mean something different, please let me know.
